items.title: Jay Glazer: The Moment That Changed Bears' Season and Led to Epic Win vs. Packers

items.title: Should Group of 5 Teams get automatic bids to CFP? Joel Klatt thinks they shouldn't

items.title: Panthers' Bryce Young scrambles & finds Ja'Tavion Sanders for go-ahead TD against Buccaneers | NFL Highlights
items.description: Carolina Panthers' Bryce Young scrambled & found Ja'Tavion Sanders for the go-ahead touchdown against the Tampa Bay Buccaneers.
